name: Batak - trick taking card game
description:
Batak is an addicting, fun, trick-taking card game played by 4 players, very similar to Spades. This game is known by many different names around the world, but no matter the name, it is loved and played all over the world!

This amazingly designed and animated app, offers two games in one:

•Simple game - all players bid and the goal is to take at least the number of tricks you bid for

•Auction game – all players bid and the player, who suggested the highest bid, wins the auction. This player has to take at least the number of tricks he bid for as well, but the other players need to take at least one trick

(Check the help section for further instructions)

This Batak game includes fast matchmaking that connects players over the internet.
You have choice to play with random player or invite a friend.

Now that you know, just download and enjoy!
